data.name: Kree Cyborg
data.description: An elite warrior armed with cybernetics that enhance speed, and strength.

starItems.name: Kree Cyborg
starItems.description: An elite warrior armed with cybernetics that enhance speed, and strength.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

On Kill, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage and grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

On Kill, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage and grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

On Kill, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage and grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.

On Kill, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage and grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.

On Kill, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage and grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
On Kill, generate Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random allies

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.

On Kill, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage and grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random allies.
6.nextUpgrade: On Kill, generate Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.

On Kill, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage and grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>80%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>80%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary attack
Always Bonus Attack

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.

1.description:
On Enemy <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed per <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.
1.nextUpgrade: Chance to gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns for self and a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally

2.description:
On Enemy <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed per <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for self and a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally

3.description:
On Enemy <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed per <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for self and a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally
On Turn, copy all positive effects from an ally Ultimus to this character

4.description:
On Enemy <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed per <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

On Turn, copy all positive effects from an ally Ultimus to this character.
4.nextUpgrade: Always gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for self and a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally

5.description:
On Enemy <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed per <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

On Turn, copy all positive effects from an ally Ultimus to this character.
